PHRASE.LANG: You've found all the parts! Head back to the assembly station to put them together.
Sie haben alle Teile gefunden! Begeben Sie sich zur Montage-Station, um Sie zusammenzusetzen.
You've found all the parts! Head back to the assembly station to put them together.
You've found all the parts! Head back to the assembly station to put them together.
¡Has encontrado todas las piezas! Regresa a la sala de montaje para unirlas.
Vous avez trouvé toutes les parties ! Retournez au poste d'assemblage pour les monter.
Hai trovato tutti i pezzi! Torna alla postazione di assemblaggio per metterli insieme.
すべてのパーツを見つけた！
모든 부품을 찾았습니다! 조립대로 돌아가서 조립을 시도하십시오.
您已經找到所有零件！返回組裝站並將它們組合在一起吧。
您已經找到所有零件！返回組裝站並將它們組合在一起吧。

Now that you've found all of the golden parts, it's time to assemble them. Put them together in the same way that you assembled the normal AK in the field-stripping game. However, this time around you'll have to do without the guides. \n\n Assemble the parts in 12 seconds or less to earn a golden AK-47 for your SOCOM: Confrontation account.

Da Sie jetzt alle goldenen Teile gefunden haben, wird es Zeit, sie zusammenzusetzen. Bauen Sie sie auf die gleiche Art zusammen wie schon die normale AK im Demontage-Spiel. Diesmal müssen Sie allerdings ohne die Anleitung auskommen.\n\nSetzen Sie die Teile in höchstens 12 Sekunden zusammen, um für Ihr "SOCOM: Confrontation"-Konto eine goldene AK-47 zu erhalten.

Now that you've found all of the golden parts, it's time to assemble them. Put them together in the same way that you assembled the normal AK in the field-stripping game. However, this time around you'll have to do without the guides. \n\n Assemble the parts in 12 seconds or less to earn a golden AK-47 for your SOCOM: Confrontation account.

Now that you've found all of the golden parts, it's time to assemble them. Put them together in the same way that you assembled the normal AK in the field-stripping game. However, this time around you'll have to do without the guides. \n\n Assemble the parts in 12 seconds or less to earn a golden AK-47 for your SOCOM: Confrontation account.

Ahora que has encontrado todas las piezas de oro, es hora de montarlas. Júntalas de la misma manera que en el juego de desmontar el AK. Sin embargo, esta vez lo deberás hacer sin ayuda. \n\n Monta todas las piezas en 12 segundos o menos y obtendrás un AK-47 de oro para tu cuenta de SOCOM: Confrontation.

Maintenant que vous avez trouvé toutes les parties dorées, il est temps de les assembler. Montez-les comme l’AK normal dans le jeu de démontage. Cependant, vous devrez le faire sans guide.\n\n Assemblez les parties en 12 secondes ou moins pour gagner un AK-47 doré pour votre compte SOCOM: Confrontation.

Ora che hai trovato tutti i pezzi d'oro, è il momento di assemblarli. Montali come hai fatto con l'AK normale nel relativo minigioco, ma stavolta cerca di cavartela senza le guide. \n\n Assembla i pezzi in 12 secondi o meno per ottenere un AK-47 d'oro per il tuo account di SOCOM: Confrontation.

金色のパーツをすべて見つけた。さっそく組み立てろ。通常の「AK-47の分解結合ゲーム」と要領は同じだ。ただし今回は、ガイド無しでやらなければならない。

12秒以下で組み立てることができたら、
 「SOCOM: CONFRONTATION」のアカウントに金色のAKが追加されるぞ。
황금 부품을 모두 찾았으니 이제는 조립을 해야 합니다. 일반 AK의 야전 조립과 방법은 동일합니다. 그러나 이번에는 도움 없이 혼자 해야만 합니다. \n\n 12초 내에 부품들을 조립하여 자신의 SOCOM: Confrontation 계정에 황금 AK-47을 획득하세요.
現在您已經找到所有黃金零件，是要組合它們的時候了。將這些零件利用AK-47 變拆遊戲的要領進行組裝吧。但是這次您必須在沒有任何說明的狀態下進行組裝。\n\n若在12秒以內組裝完成，便能獲得這把黃金AK-47。
現在您已經找到所有黃金零件，是要組合它們的時候了。將這些零件利用AK-47 分解組裝遊戲的要領進行組裝吧。但是這次您必須在沒有任何說明的狀態下進行組裝。\n\n若在12秒以內組裝完成，便能獲得這把黃金AK-47。
Congratulations! You've earned a gold AK
Glückwunsch! Sie haben eine goldene AK erhalten!
Congratulations! You've earned a gold AK
Congratulations! You've earned a gold AK
¡Enhorabuena! Has obtenido un AK-47 de oro.
Félicitations ! Vous avez gagné un AK doré
Complimenti! Hai ottenuto un AK d'oro.
おめでとう！ 金色のAKを手に入れた
恭喜！您已經得到一把黃金AK步槍。
恭喜！您已經得到一把黃金AK步槍。
Nicht schnell genug. Versuchen Sie es wieder.
Tienes que darte más prisa. Inténtalo de nuevo.
まだ遅い。やりなおしだ。
You already have a gold AK, but feel free to play as often as you like to improve your time.
Sie haben schon eine goldene AK, aber spielen Sie ruhig, so oft Sie möchten, um Ihre Zeit zu verbessern.
You already have a gold AK, but feel free to play as often as you like to improve your time.
You already have a gold AK, but feel free to play as often as you like to improve your time.
Ya tienes un AK 47 de oro, pero puedes volver a jugar tantas veces como quieras para mejorar tu tiempo.
Vous avez déjà obtenu un AK doré, mais n'hésitez pas à jouer autant que vous le voulez pour améliorer votre temps.
Hai già un AK d'oro, ma non esitare a giocare se vuoi migliorare il tuo tempo.
すでに金色のAKを手に入れたようだが、新記録を狙いたくなったらいつでも来るといい。
황금 AK는 이미 지급되었습니다. 더 빠른 기록을 원한다면 마음껏 플레이하세요!
您已經得到了黃金AK步槍。但如果您想要更新時間紀錄，您還是可以繼續挑戰。
您已經得到了黃金AK步槍。但如果您想要更新時間紀錄，您還是可以繼續挑戰。
You've just found part of a golden AK-47! Keep looking for the other parts to assemble your very own solid gold AK.
Sie haben gerade einen Teil der goldenen AK-47 gefunden! Halten Sie weiter Ausschau nach den anderen Teilen, um Ihre eigene AK aus massivem Gold zusammenzusetzen!
You've just found part of a golden AK-47! Keep looking for the other parts to assemble your very own solid gold AK.
You've just found part of a golden AK-47! Keep looking for the other parts to assemble your very own solid gold AK.
¡Acabas de encontrar una pieza del AK-47 de oro! Sigue buscando las demás para montar tu propio AK-47 de oro macizo.
Vous venez de trouver l'une des parties de l'AK-47 doré ! Continuez de chercher les autres parties pour assembler votre propre AK doré.
Hai trovato un pezzo dell'AK-47 d'oro! Cerca anche gli altri pezzi per assemblare un AK d'oro massiccio.
金色のAK-47のパーツを見つけた！ 他のパーツも見つけ出して、自分だけの金色のAKを組み立てよう。
황금 AK-47의 부품을 발견했습니다! 단단한 황금으로 만들어진 자신만의 AK를 가지고 싶다면, 다른 부품들도 찾아보세요.
您找到一個黃金AK-47的零件了！請繼續尋找其他零件以組裝屬於您自己的黃金AK步槍吧。
您找到一個黃金AK-47的零件了！請繼續尋找其他零件以組裝屬於您自己的黃金AK步槍吧。
In order to assemble the golden AK, you must first find all seven parts. Explore the spaces a bit more and come back when you've found them all.
Um die goldene AK zusammenzusetzen, müssen Sie alle sieben Teile finden. Erkunden Sie die Bereiche noch etwas und kommen Sie zurück, wenn Sie alle Teile gefunden haben.
In order to assemble the golden AK, you must first find all seven parts. Explore the spaces a bit more and come back when you've found them all.
In order to assemble the golden AK, you must first find all seven parts. Explore the spaces a bit more and come back when you've found them all.
Para montar el AK-47 de oro tienes que encontrar las siete piezas. Explora los lugares un poco mejor y vuelve cuando las tengas todas.
Afin d'assembler l'AK doré, vous devez d'abord trouver les sept parties. Explorez les cartes un peu plus et revenez quand vous les aurez toutes trouvées.
Per assemblare l'AK d'oro, devi per prima cosa trovare i sette pezzi. Esplora le ambientazioni e torna quando li avrai trovati tutti.
金色のAKを組み立てるには、まず7つすべての部品を集める必要がある。しっかり探して、すべて集まったら戻ってくるといい。
황금 AK를 조립하기 위해서는 일곱 개의 부품을 모두 찾아야 합니다. 스페이스를 더 깊이 탐험한 후, 모두 발견하면 돌아오십시오.
若要組裝這把黃金AK步槍，您必須要先找出總共7個的零件。在本大廳中仔細尋找，找到後再回到這裡吧。
若要組裝這把黃金AK步槍，您必須要先找出總共7個的零件。在本大廳中仔細尋找，找到後再回到這裡吧。
Bauen Sie eine goldene AK-47 zusammen.

Great time, but you don't seem to have a SOCOM account. Please visit www.socom.com and login with your PSN ID to create a SOCOM account. \n\n Once you've done that, come back here to earn a gold AK-47.

Great time, but you don't seem to have a SOCOM account. Please visit www.socom.com and login with your PSN ID to create a SOCOM account. \n\n Once you've done that, come back here to earn a gold AK-47.

Great time, but you don't seem to have a SOCOM account. Please visit www.socom.com and login with your PSN ID to create a SOCOM account. \n\n Once you've done that, come back here to earn a gold AK-47.
